overview: In an afternoon of summer, only two female customers are in the cafe. One is having a cake, the other is drinking a coffee. A woman staff is taking view the space with boresome. All three women are looking on invisible time with different point of view simultaneously, and a young chap is strolling about the street near the cafe, and then coming back to the building after passing by around the cafe. (SIFF2004)
title: Se gaeui mello
